<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Downpour](/Spells.aspx?ID=1849)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 381 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=98)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 30-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call forth a torrential downpour, which extinguishes non-magical flames. Creatures in the area are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) and gain fire resistance 10. Creatures outside the area are concealed to those inside the area. If a creature with weakness to water ends its turn in the area, the downpour triggers its weakness.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The fire resistance increases by 2.
name: Downpour
